Definition in file arrayoptimize.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum LinMinTypes

Used to specify the type of line minimization subroutine for bfgs and bfgs2.

Enumerator:
LNSRCH  Use the line search algorithm (lnsrch).
CBLNSRCH  Use the cubic line search algorithm (cblnsrch).
LINMIN  Use the linmin algorithm.
DERIVLINMIN  Use the dlinmin algorithm.

Definition at line 89 of file arrayoptimize.h.
